entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Tatamagouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Debert 09:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. High zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening then north 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
